data.comment: Goal! Eindhoven have got their heads in front thanks to a Philipp Max strike.
In the minute 14, Pablo Rosario with an assist there.
Goal! Mario Gotze extends Eindhoven's lead to 2-0.
Denzel Dumfries instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 40, Eindhoven's Pablo Rosario has been booked in Eindhoven.
The first-half is over at Philips Stadion.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ole Romeny is on a sub for Jan-Arie Van der Heijden for Willem II.
Willem II make their second substitution with Gorkem Saglam replacing Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye.
He's off! Derrick Kohn is shown a red card.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Cody Gakpo with Chukwunonso Madueke.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's second substitution at Philips Stadion with Mauro Junior replacing Mario Gotze.
Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) is making a third substitution, with Adrian Fein replacing Pablo Rosario.
In the minute 82, Eindhoven take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Donyell Malen.
That's a fine assist from Denzel Dumfries.
Miquel Nelom is replacing Vangelis Pavlidis for Willem II at Philips Stadion.
In the minute 88, The home team have replaced Ibrahim Sangare with Mathias Kjolo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
Allard Lindhout blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
